about_the_game:
Horror Adventure : Zombie Edition is a zombie shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. There has been an outbreak of a mysterious virus killing people and transforming them into zombies. There are a few survivors left. As one of the few people left on this planet, experience what it’s like to live in the city of the undead. Fight the dead, save other people, hunt in the world and find ways to survive. Kill the virus infected people and protect your family..

Features:

⦁ Single Player Story: A full fledged narrative campaign to give you a taste of what it’s like in a post-apocalyptic world.

⦁ Interaction System: Heavy physics based realistic interactions including support for weapon pickup, reload and ladder climbing system.

⦁ Weapons system: Support for more than 15+ unlockable weapons throughout the story.

⦁ High quality graphics: Realistic graphics for an unparalleled Virtual Reality Experience.

Note : Demo version give access to training area and chapter 1. To Experience full gameplay with all the chapters Buy Full Version. This is VR Only version of game with Steam VR Support With compatability for PSVR2, Oculus, HTC Vive.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is based on zombie killing and horror feel in all chapters of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 Graphic Card or Compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Compatible with PSVR2, Oculus, HTC Vive (STEAM VR)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Compatible with PSVR2, Oculus, HTC Vive (STEAM VR)
